boss1.speaker: boss
boss1.text: Rowena? Are you kidding me? Do you even grasp the colossal clusterfuck you've unleashed?

boss2.speaker: boss
boss2.text: Clients are losing their shit, deadlines are being pulverized, and Zeus knows what you're doing!

boss3.speaker: boss
boss3.text: I can't keep mopping up after your mind-numbing incompetence. It's beyond comprehension, you've hit a new low of ineptitude!

boss4.speaker: boss
boss4.text: You've single-handedly torpedoed everything! You are so expendable, Rowena! Let's skip the pleasantries: you're goddamn fired!

boss5.speaker: boss
boss5.text: Don't even think about showing your face here ever again! You're done! Finished!
